div.div: Getting Started Guide for Facebook Web Application

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

div.div:
Perform the following actions to start using the Facebook web application:
Create an account.
Set up your account.

section.p: You need an account to use the Facebook web application for the first time.

li.span: In the Facebook login page, select Create new account to display the Sign Up dialogue box.
In the Sign Up dialogue box, enter the following details:

ul.li: First name: Enter your first name.
Mobile number or email address: Enter your mobile number or email address.
Date of birth: Enter your date of birth using the date, month, and year dropdown.

Gender: Select an option from Female, Male, and Custom. If you select Custom, select an option from the Select your pronoun dropdown and enter your gender.
Note: Entering your gender in the Gender field is optional.

li.span: Enter the code sent in the confirmation dialogue box to confirm your email address or mobile number.
(Optional) Select the Send Email Again option if you did not receive the code the first time.
(Optional) Select Send Message Again if you entered your mobile number.
Instead, if you want to update the contact information, perform the following steps:

ol.li: In the Add email address or mobile number dialogue box, enter your email address or phone number.

Click Add.
Now, you can verify using the email address or phone number that you recently added.

li.span: In the Account confirmed dialogue box, click Ok.

section.p: You need to perform some actions to keep your account updated and let others find you on Facebook.

li.p: On the left pane of the Facebook homepage, select your name.

ol.li: In your profile screen, select Edit profile to display the Edit profile screen.

In the Edit profile screen, you can perform the following tasks:
Add your profile picture.
Add your cover photo.
Create your avatar.
Add your biography.
Add your introduction.
Add your hobbies.
Feature your favourite photos and stories.

Click Edit your About info to add information about you such as workplace, school, college, hometown, and relationship status.
Add details about you in each section as mentioned in the table below.
Table 1. Edit About Info (continued)
S. No Sections Details
1. Overview
Add a workplace
Add high school
Add college
Add current city
Add hometown
Add a relationship status
2. Work and education
Add a workplace
Add college
Add high school
3. Places lived
Add current city
Add hometown
Add city
4. Contact and basic info
Add a mobile number
Add an email address
Add a website
Add a social link
Add a language
Add gender
Add birth date and year
5. Family and relationships
Add a relationship status
Add family member
6. Details about you
Write some details about you
Add a name pronunciation
Add other names
Add favorite quotes
Add blood donation details
7. Life events
Add a life event
Your account is set up and you can use the Facebook web application.
